comments:
Using I20050527-0010

Steps to reproduce:
- Create project, inclusion and exclusion patterns disabled
- Copy eg. junit.jar to the project directory
- Invoke action Add to Build Path

-> Error Message appears in the UI and the log shows:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Inclusion or exclusion patterns are 
disabled in project Test, cannot selectively
 include or exclude from entry: ''
        at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.buildpath.ClasspathModifier.validateAndAddEntry
(ClasspathModifier.java:1851)
        at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.buildpath.ClasspathModifier.setNewEntry
(ClasspathModifier.java:1755)
        at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.buildpath.ClasspathModifier.addLibraryEntries
(ClasspathModifier.java:350)
        at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.buildpath.AddSelectedLibraryOperation.run
(AddSelectedLibraryOperation.java:70
)
        at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.buildpaths.newsourcepage.BuildPathAction$1.
run(BuildPathAction.java:120)
        at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:113)

This exception should not be logged
unfortunatly not trivial, would have to rewrite quite some code from erol.

I can't reproduce in I20051220-0800, can anyone? However, I've found two bugs related to this one:

Bug 122504
Bug 122505
closing as works for me. Reopen if you do not agree.
